oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bill of sale for "Washington" a Bradley County slave
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bill of sale conveying a slave named "Washington" owned by John Henderson of Bradley County, Tennessee. to John Fain of Union County, Georgia in 1855. An ambrotype of Washington can be found in (brad007). Washington was then, in 1855, of 10-12 years of age and warranted to be "sound, healthy and sensible, and a slave for life."
